I really have come to love this company and love their fabrics and love their shirts. I wanted to try this banded collar shirt and there’s nothing wrong with this shirt. If you like the style, you’ll love the shirt. It’s the wash & wear aspect of the fabrics that I especially love and the shirts always look good. What was upsetting this time is that someone else had worn one of the shirts I received and returned it and the shipper just stuck it back in a plastic bag and sent it out. When I took it out it was all wrinkled and turned inside out from the previous wearer. Clearly somebody was not paying attention at all and I did not appreciate that.

评论详情: Liked the style of the shirt, thought it would have been great for Vegas, not so much. The shirt fits fine, it's the cut for the neck. Good material and such, but they need a new pattern.
They are plastic fiber shirts. Suitable for winter, do not expect a linen (or even cotton) level comfort in the summer.

I wish I had read the 1 star reviews like usually do with all of my Amazon purchases but this was a flash deal with almost no time left, so I pulled the trigger. Mistake. While I wasn't disappointed with the look and fit, the actual material it is made from make it an absolute no go. It is 70% polyester, 27% rayon, and 3% spandex - basically a tablecloth cut into shirt. I bought this to wear in Thailand, but, with the heat and humidity there, I would probably suffocate to death wearing those synthetic materials. Returned.
